tweet: 'Privacy in an open society requires anonymous transaction systems. Until now, cash has been the primary such system. An anonymous transaction system is not a secret transaction system. [1/2]

📢 Privacy coins join the #DeFi world with their wrapped versions!  We welcome @Monero, @Dashpay & @zcash into the Rubic’s DeFi ecosystem. An anonymous transaction system empowers individuals to to reveal their identity when desires and only when desired; this is the essence of privacy.' - Eric Hughes [2/2]
